Question: When the Trunk port sends the data frame how to deal with?
Answer A: When the VLAN ID is the same as the PVID of the port and is a VLAN ID allowed by the port
Answer B: remove the Tag and send the message
Answer C: When the VLAN ID is different from the PVID of the port
Answer E: When the VLAN ID is different from the PVID of the port
Answer G: When the VLAN ID is different from the PVID of the port
Answer H: strip off the TAG and forward
